subject: AI & Agents
title: The Energy Cost Nobody Mentions
description: A quick, practical guide to The Energy Cost Nobody Mentions.

hook.text: Training GPT-4 used more electricity than some small countries consume in a year.

buildup.text: AI data centers consume enormous amounts of energy for training and inference at scale.

discovery.text: A single ChatGPT query uses roughly 10x more energy than a Google search.

twist.text: Tech companies pledging carbon neutrality are simultaneously building the most energy-hungry technology ever.

climax.text: Efficient architectures, better chips, and renewable energy may help, but the gap is growing.

punchline.text: Intelligence has a power bill. The planet pays it.

quiz.question: How does AI's energy consumption compare to traditional computing?
options: A ChatGPT query uses roughly 10 times more energy than a Google search
AI uses less energy than regular computing
Energy consumption is irrelevant to AI development
